long_description: The svelte SolarFocus Power+ lighted cover for the Kindle 4 is the perfect companion for your Kindle e-reader, offering it protection, a built-in reading lamp and auxiliary power. No straps or latches to mess with-simply slip your Kindle 4 into the stylish leatherette cover and press it into place. Pop-up reading lamp provides up to 800 lux light, illuminating the screen surface for after-dark reading; it automatically turns on when released and turns off when put back. The SolarFocus Power+ lighted cover features a reserve battery that supplements your Kindle 4's battery and provides up to 50 hrs. of power to the reading lamp. 3-color LED indicator shows the reserve battery's remaining strength.
short_description: The svelte SolarFocus Power+ lighted cover for the Kindle 4 is the perfect companion for your Kindle e-reader, offering it protection, a built-in reading lamp and auxiliary power.
